description: Tests loop node with condition-based iteration. The workflow polls status until iteration count reaches 3.
query: Please use the LoopPollingWorkflow to poll status with max_iterations of 3, and render the output file.

evaluation.expected_response: The LoopPollingWorkflow has successfully completed polling. The workflow iterated 3 times until ready condition was met. Final iteration: 2, Ready: true, Status: checking
evaluation.criterion: Evaluate if the orchestrator successfully delegated to LoopPollingWorkflow, and the workflow correctly used loop node to iterate until ready (expected 3 iterations with final_iteration=2 when ready=true).
